```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

prog <- read_xlsx("./ForHer22_PROGRAM_w_posters.xlsx") %>%
  select(-7) %>%
  mutate(event = if_else(str_detect(event, "S1-|S2-|S3-|S4-|S5-|S6-|S7-"),
                         paste0("[", event, "](#", tolower(event), ")"),
                         event))

```

## Monday: 18 April 2022 {.unnumbered}


```{r, echo=FALSE}
prog %>% 
  filter(!is.na(day)) %>%
  filter(day == "Monday 18/4") %>% 
  select(-day) %>% 
  kbl() %>%
  kable_paper("hover", full_width = T) %>% 
  column_spec(column = c(1,2), width = "100px") %>% 
  row_spec(row = 1, background = "#D6EAF8")

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
  row_spec(row = c(1, 2, 3, 8, 13, 20, 21, 28, 34, 35, 40), background = "#D6EAF8") %>%
```
